name: Space 101 - GMTK 2021
description:
An Endless 2D pixel-art Space shooter game for GMTK 2021.

Theme: Joined Together

How to Play?

Use Mouse to Position your spaceship

Left Mouse Button to Shoot the projectiles

Space to Discharged the Modules (If reached certain amount of Modules, the repulse can clean an area of projectiles)

Esc to Exit the Game from Menu

Features:

Gathered the modules by collide with them such as weapons and shield to protect yourself from the enemy. Enemy enable to do the same. IF you have too many modules for your spaceship, you will be punished by slowing down till uncontrollable. To avoid this, you can discharged the modules from the ship. Try yourself to reach to the end of 1000 light years :)

Credits:

My friend Onasis to help me dealing with  the sfx.

Theme song: Space Half by TAD.

v1.1 - Increase lightyear increase rate
